review_data.title: Great lunch spot
review_data.content: Came here for a quick lunch and was nicely impressed. They have a salad bar concept for chipotle, burrito etc. Lots of choice and food is fresh. They spoke good english also

review_data.title: Take away
review_data.content: Ich kenne diesen Style von Essen von Chipotle und ich liebe es.. Ich betreibe sehr viel Sport und es ist...More

review_data.title: Good food and cheap for Zurich
review_data.content: I thought this place was a lot like Chipolte. I had a burrito and it was made on "the assembly line". The food was tasty and inexpensive compared to other options in Zurich. This place hasn't been open that long and that probably accounts for...More

review_data.title: Zapote Löwenstrasse
review_data.content: Neueröffnung , und bereits eine Riesen Schlange! Offene Küche mit Superfreundlichem Personal. Hatte das Burrito Combo inkl. Salat und Getränk....More

review_data.title: Mittagessen
review_data.content: Burritos oder Salat mit Zutaten die man sich eigens Zusammenstellen kann! Chicken, Fleisch oder Gemüse was man will! Super Konzept!...More

review_data.title: Lunch-Begeisterung
review_data.content: Wir haben bei Zapote Binz bestellt für unseren Lunch im Büro für knapp 30 Personen. Alle waren restlos begeistert von...More

review_data.title: A let down compared to their Wallisellen outlet
review_data.content: Access with public transit Tram S10 from Zürich main train station to Binz (4min). There is a large outside seating patio area with many wicker tables and chairs all protected by umbrellas or the shade of trees. Inside are mostly wooden tables and chairs, tall...More
